feedback_items.title: Add Trainer_finder functionality
feedback_items.description:
I would like to extend the Tennis booking application with a Trainer finder functionality.
Add 1) a checkbox to the search interface "Including trainer" 2) a textfield "Trainer name"

When the checkbox is clicked, in addition to the current functionality also the availability of the trainers are checked in the desired period. See below one examplary API-request and response. Please find a good UI to show the trainers. Booking the trainer hour is not yet required.

If also a certain name is filled in, only that specific trainer's availability shall be shown.

This is the API (for a specific timeframe) (I think also a token is needed)

https://reservierung.dasspiel.at/calendar/booking-data/?date=2026-01-13&time_start=09:00&square_id=3c3895e4-111f-4387-b815-7506ffe26607&is_half_hour=0

This is the answer:

F\\u00fcr Outdoor-Preise beachten Sie bitte unsere Sommerpreisliste\"},\"tunes\":{\"alignTune\":{\"alignment\":\"center\"}}},{\"id\":\"UbLia8zuOz\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"caption\":null,\"withBorder\":false,\"withBackground\":false,\"stretched\":false,\"file\":{\"url\":\"\\\/storage\\\/images\\\/square-rules\\\/Preisliste_fr_ORS.jpg\"}}}],\"version\":\"2.31.0\"}","info_bot":"{\"time\":1762955953168,\"blocks\":[{\"id\":\"z7T8Jo625i\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"text\":\"<b>Buchungen halber Stunden sind nur nach telefonischer Absprache mit der Rezeption unter 01 \\\/ 799 01 01 m\\u00f6glich!<\\\/b>\"},\"tunes\":{\"alignTune\":{\"alignment\":\"center\"}}}],\"version\":\"2.31.0\"}","msg_protected":"Aufgrund der aktuellen Verordnungen kann dieser Platz nicht gebucht werden.","rules":"{\"time\":1762955953168,\"blocks\":[{\"id\":\"JwjnpNxlhc\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"text\":\"Gebuchte Stunden k\\u00f6nnen bis <b>48 Stunden vor Spielbeginn<\\\/b> (online oder telefonisch) kostenfrei storniert werden. Nicht rechtzeitig stornierte Stunden sind zu bezahlen bzw. werden vom Kundenkonto abgebucht.\"},\"tunes\":{\"alignTune\":{\"alignment\":\"center\"}}}],\"version\":\"2.31.0\"}","is_half_hour":0,"is_allowed_to_book":true,"is_bookable":true,"is_season_bookable":false,"is_occupied":false,"is_in_past":false,"is_own_booking":false,"season_data":[],"is_gt":false,"gt_data":[],"is_user":true,"rental_data":[],"possible_rentals":[{"time_start":"09:00","time_end":"10:00","price":26},{"time_start":"09:00","time_end":"11:00","price":52},{"time_start":"09:00","time_end":"12:00","price":75}],"nof_players":5,"trainer_data":[{"time_start":"09:00","time_end":"10:00","price":66,"trainers":[{"name":"ROSSEN","uuid":"b30f3a05-b860-42c9-87fe-91239b9a1d74","training_types":[1,2,3]},{"name":"TOBIAS W.","uuid":"bb25057b-6a78-4f44-8803-103b5f7d6560","training_types":[1,2,3]}]},{"time_start":"09:00","time_end":"11:00","price":132,"trainers":[{"name":"ROSSEN","uuid":"b30f3a05-b860-42c9-87fe-91239b9a1d74","training_types":[1,2,3]},{"name":"TOBIAS W.","uuid":"bb25057b-6a78-4f44-8803-103b5f7d6560","training_types":[1,2,3]}]},{"time_start":"09:00","time_end":"12:00","price":198,"trainers":[{"name":"ROSSEN","uuid":"b30f3a05-b860-42c9-87fe-91239b9a1d74","training_types":[1,2,3]},{"name":"TOBIAS W.","uuid":"bb25057b-6a78-4f44-8803-103b5f7d6560","training_types":[1,2,3]}]},{"time_start":"09:00","time_end":"13:00","price":264,"trainers":[{"name":"ROSSEN","uuid":"b30f3a05-b860-42c9-87fe-91239b9a1d74","training_types":[1,2,3]},{"name":"TOBIAS W.","uuid":"bb25057b-6a78-4f44-8803-103b5f7d6560","training_types":[1,2,3]}]}],"is_training_bookable":true,"is_own_season_shiftable":false,"is_queue":false,"is_gt_in_future":false,"square_name":"Platz 5 HALLE"}}

Please make sure, that the API usage is not crashing the system and considered as an attack.

feedback_items.title: Fix Ui for Trainer Booking
feedback_items.description:
I do not see the agreed UI elements for trainer booking, although it seeems from the report, that the functionality has been implemented.

Please review the status and fix it
feedback_items.resolution: The UI elements were already present in templates/index.html but weren't visible because the PM2-managed Flask application (running for 8 days) needed to be restarted to reload the template changes. Restarted PM2 process 'tennis-booking' to apply the previously committed template updates. UI now shows: 1) 'Including trainer' checkbox and 2) 'Trainer name' text field (appears when checkbox is checked).

feedback_items.title: Adapt Trainer_finder functionality
feedback_items.description:
When the trainer_finder functionality is checked, than the application should ONLY look for available trainers (and not courts).
The checkbox "including trainer" shall be changed to a switcher "Court" or "Trainer". The application shall search EITHER courts OR Trainers

feedback_items.title: Review Booking step
feedback_items.description: Etwas mit der Platz Buchung im Arsenal scheint nicht in Ordnung zu sein. Meine Suche am 21. Januar ergab einen freien Platz von 18 bis 19:00 Uhr. Ich hab auf den Knopf gedrückt „ Platz buchen“. Gebucht wurde aber der Platz von 7:00 bis 8:00 Uhr in der Früh. Bitte schau was nicht in Ordnung ist und teste es mit einer erfolgreichen Buchung. Ich werde es nachher stornieren

feedback_items.title: Court selector
feedback_items.description:
Please add a selector with the two available locations (Arsenal, PostSV) with checkboxes for the user to decide, where they want to search for courts. Default is both checked.

For trainer search, the location selection shall be hidden.
